feed.title: YTPTube Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: master-20250604-38d99c0
entry.content:
• 18dea30 Make sure to build linux/arm64 for default branch by arabcoders
  • ca10640 Minor improvements to notification dropdown by arabcoders
  • e2e6619 fixed bug in default URL separator selector. by arabcoders
  • 5075571 Disable linux/arm64 builds for non-default branch by arabcoders
  • 5543c68 Update README for clarity and improve installation instructions for podman and unraid. by arabcoders
  • 4294070 Make the URLs separator user configurable by arabcoders
  • 4ad9ee5 Refactor terminology from "CLI arguments" to "command options for yt-dlp" across multiple files for consistency and clarity. by arabcoders
  • 1a48a3e improve the build process by arabcoders
  • 3647595 Make it possible to import data from pre-existing preset. by arabcoders
  • e8a5250 Implemented notification center. Closes #290 by arabcoders
  • 7316149 Incorrect message of deleting file is showing even though the option to delete file is disabled. by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: master-20250605-f1f79af
entry.content:
• cfb600b minor README text update by arabcoders
  • 8b0b744 Add option to completely disable videos thumbnail. by arabcoders
  • 0f0dd51 Add support for running YTPTube from sub-directory. Fix #295 by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: master-20250614-2eab819
entry.content:
• 4367fb0 Add option to remove item from archive, and minor ui updates. by arabcoders
  • 1c8de32 tag premiere video correctly. by arabcoders
  • bb41ead add the ability to prevent downloading youtube premiere initial stream. by arabcoders
  • a478e8e minor design update by arabcoders
  • fb51fc3 upgrade packages by arabcoders
  • 5212dfe Refactor HttpSocket to be more manageable and more modular. by arabcoders
  • c1f8fd5 rename api namespace by arabcoders
  • 400cf7b completely refactored HttpAPI into more manageable routes. by arabcoders
  • 698791b minor design update for index page. by arabcoders
  • 294ec31 completed path migration by arabcoders
  • e42af75 load preset cookies in all cases. by arabcoders
  • 49fd598 update dependencies by arabcoders
  • d3bdb55 fix uv yt-dlp upgrader by arabcoders
  • 9e130ae re-added daily yt-dlp checker by arabcoders
  • 93ff749 We no longer auto load cookies.txt from config path. it must be set via the ytdlp.cli or preset. by arabcoders
  • e251fba Fix healthcheck when used with base_path by arabcoders
  • 7bae93a re-enable caching for pip packages. by arabcoders
  • b1bc399 WiP: more changes to classes to support Path by arabcoders
  • 6a9beea WIP: Migrated DownloadQueue to use Path by arabcoders
  • 6d774a6 switch to uv instead of pipenv, and partially fix the code to work on windows. by arabcoders
  • 2676ed0 support pywebview by arabcoders
  • 6e7684c app.spec by arabcoders
  • 700fe41 plans for native app by arabcoders
  • 9419e15 minor changes to changelog page by arabcoders
  • 517f60f Added ts implementation of yt-dlp match_str by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: master-20250615-4c76aa7
entry.content:
• 38dc9c1 spin the icon if the item is queued. by arabcoders
  • ffcae45 the ability to mark notification as low priority to bypass the toast by arabcoders
  • 784671c Fix premiere re-queue. by arabcoders
  • 367d4a1 Fixed bug in auth handler. by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: master-20250616-c07465a
entry.content:
• 249bb43 RSS feed support for youtube channel/playlist. by arabcoders
  • 4ee0a99 Add new service for dependency injection. by arabcoders
  • ba650fe minor changes by arabcoders
  • 1d8fc51 upgrade packages. by arabcoders
  • 3708734 minor status name changes by arabcoders
